Package com.avrix.ui.widgets

Class ComboBoxWidget

java.lang.Object
com.avrix.ui.widgets.Widget
com.avrix.ui.widgets.PanelWidget
com.avrix.ui.widgets.ComboBoxWidget
public class ComboBoxWidget extends PanelWidget
A customizable ComboBoxWidget. This widget allows users to select a value from a dropdown list.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    protected class 
    ComboBoxWidget.ComboPopupButton
    The ComboPopupButton class represents a button within the dropdown popup menu of a ComboBoxWidget.
